results.title: [Simvastatin in the treatment of hypercholesterolemia].
results.text_hl: We have treated twelve @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@: six had type @<m>DISEASE_Osteogenesis_imperfecta_type_2A</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536042 @@@IIA hypercholesterolaemia@@@ and the other six had type IIB.

citations.NLM: Cigala O, Pancallo MT, Della Valle M, Marasco A, Malarbi AL. [Simvastatin in the treatment of hypercholesterolemia]. Clin Ter. 1991 Jun 15;137(5):333-7. PMID: 1832606
citations.BibTeX: @article{1832606, title={[Simvastatin in the treatment of hypercholesterolemia].}, author={Cigala O and Pancallo MT and Della Valle M and Marasco A and Malarbi AL}, journal={Clin Ter}, volume={137}, number={5}, pages={333-7}}

results.title: Long-term therapy with high-dose simvastatin does not affect adrenocortical and gonadal hormones in hypercholesterolemic patients.
results.text_hl: In this report, we examined adrenal and sex @CHEMICAL_Steroids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013256 @@@steroids@@@ in 10 @<m>DISEASE_Osteogenesis_imperfecta_type_2A</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536042 @@@type IIA hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (three with familial [@DISEASE_143890 @DISEASE_OMIM:143890 @@@FH@@@] and seven with @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@polygenic hypercholesterolemia@@@) over a period of 1 year on @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy in order to confirm in vivo its selective action.

citations.NLM: Azzarito C, Boiardi L, Zini M, Agosti A, Dotti C, Biagi R, Portioli I. Long-term therapy with high-dose simvastatin does not affect adrenocortical and gonadal hormones in hypercholesterolemic patients. Metabolism. 1992 Feb;41(2):148-53. PMID: 1310516
citations.BibTeX: @article{1310516, title={Long-term therapy with high-dose simvastatin does not affect adrenocortical and gonadal hormones in hypercholesterolemic patients.}, author={Azzarito C and Boiardi L and Zini M and Agosti A and Dotti C and Biagi R and Portioli I}, journal={Metabolism}, volume={41}, number={2}, pages={148-53}}
